Title: Captain Peralta
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Daniel J. Goor, Gabe Liedman (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (executive story editor), Matt O'Brien (executive story editor), Brigitte Liebowitz (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake's mainly absentee father, Roger (guest star Bradley Whitford), comes to town to spend some time with his son. Jake can't wait to see him, but Charles is skeptical of Roger's intentions...
